text: [Chapter 04] [Sine Castle Town, Territory of Sine]

speaker: left
text: The Guild of Retool will be here any minute, stay on guard.

speaker: left
text: Hah hah hah!,

speaker: left
text: I heard they were getting reinforcements but this is nothing!

speaker: left
text: Nothing to be afraid of, let's get 'em!

speaker: left
text: Ah... I'm not going to die here...

speaker: left
text: It's time to retreat...
[The Guild of Retool retreats!]

speaker: left
text: We did it...
Hmm... that was a high amount of damage...
speaker: right
left
text: Who's there!?
It is I, the great Damagein Elite!
speaker: right
left
text: ...who?

speaker: right
text: I, the great Damagein, have dedicated my life towards seeking one thing... DAMAGE!

speaker: right
text: And I have just witnessed YOU deal DAMAGE to those bandits!

speaker: right
text: So I will ask, might I join your army in order to witness more damage?
[Recruit Damagein?] (Q) Recruit (W) Do not recruit

false.speaker: right
false.text: Very well then, I will seek damage elsewhere.

text: Are you the people who protected this town?
speaker: right

text: I am Healia Aid, and I wish to join your army for saving my hometown.
speaker: right

false.speaker: right
false.text: Understood, I wish you all a safe journey.

speaker: right
text: Understood, I wish you all a safe journey.
